mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ray, Nancy.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Wife of Jacob Ray lays before President a second memorial lately arrived from Georgia in her husband's behalf; prays gentlemen of the Bank will forgive his past errors and consent to his release. Enclosure begs admittance or permission to send in another petition from Georgia; letter written and signed "for Nancy Ray."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Ray, Jacob
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1807 January 31, Washington, [D.C.] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
